name: handwritten.js
description: Convert typed text to realistic handwriting!
author: Rahil Kabani <rahil.kabani.4@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm i && eslint . --fix && browserify -e src/index.js -s handwritten -o docs/handwritten.js && minify docs/handwritten.js -o docs/handwritten.js && git add . && (git commit -m 'fix lint errors + bump docs/handwritten.js' || :)
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run release
